Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: SB #34 and #119 buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Southbound #34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction at Michigan/115th.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/State
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, amnd 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, State, amnd 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/State.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at UIC/Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at UIC/Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
